state.description: The state of the Passkey (FIDO2) authentication method.

isSelfServiceRegistrationAllowed.description: Indicates whether users can perform self-service registration for FIDO2 keys. Must be set to true.

isAttestationEnforced.description: Indicates whether attestation must be enforced for FIDO2 key registration.

isEnforced.description: Indicates whether key restrictions are enforced.

enforcementType.description: The enforcement type for key restrictions (allow or block).

items.description: Authenticator Attestation GUID (AAGUID) in standard GUID format.

aaGuids.description: List of Authenticator Attestation GUIDs (AAGUIDs) for allowed or blocked FIDO2 authenticators.

keyRestrictions.description: Key restrictions configuration for FIDO2 authenticators.

targetType.description: The type of target (group). User type is not supported for FIDO2 policies.

displayName.description: The display name of the target group or 'all_users'. Note: 'all_users' cannot be combined with additional groups for includeTargets.

isRegistrationRequired.description: Indicates whether registration is required for the target. Must be set to false for includeTargets in FIDO2 policies.

includeTargets.description: A list of targets to include for the Passkey (FIDO2) authentication method. Only 'all_users' or specific groups are allowed.

displayName.description: The display name of the target group to exclude. 'all_users' is treated as a group name for excludeTargets.

excludeTargets.description: A list of targets to exclude for the Passkey (FIDO2) authentication method.
